1272:1286: yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti |
1272:1291: pravṛttirvā-ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti,
1272:1295: ito'pina kaścidaniyamāt kathāprasaṅgo yattenopagataṃ nāsadutpadyate na sadvinaśyati' iti tasya samarthanāyedamuktam 'ekaprakṛtikamidaṃ vyaktamanvayadarśanād' iti |
1272:1299: sukhādīnāmutpattivināśābhyupagamābhāvāt sarvasya tadātmakasya notpatti-vināśāviti siddhaṃ bhavati |
1272:1300: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati |
1272:1301: tatredaṃ syād vācyaṃ - vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛttinivṛttidharmakaṃ,
1272:1307: evaṃ hi tasya sādhanadoṣodbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito bhavati |
1272:1312: na lokaḥ śabdairapratipāditamarthaṃ pratipattuṃ samartha iti,
1272:1316: ] kathāprasaṅgāt iti idamapi hetvābhāseṣvantarbhāvāt na pṛthagvācyam |
